### RSA专题						

#### rsarsa

最基础的常规思路解即可

```python
p =  9648423029010515676590551740010426534945737639235739800643989352039852507298491399561035009163427050370107570733633350911691280297777160200625281665378483
q =  11874843837980297032092405848653656852760910154543380907650040190704283358909208578251063047732443992230647903887510065547947313543299303261986053486569407
e =  65537
c =  

#WP:
import gmpy2
import libnum
from Crypto.Util.number import *

p = 9648423029010515676590551740010426534945737639235739800643989352039852507298491399561035009163427050370107570733633350911691280297777160200625281665378483
q = 11874843837980297032092405848653656852760910154543380907650040190704283358909208578251063047732443992230647903887510065547947313543299303261986053486569407
e = 65537
c = 

n = p*q
phin = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = inverse(e,phin)
m = pow(c,d,n)

print(m)
#flag{5577446633554466577768879988}
```



#### RSA

常规思路解即可

```python
在一次RSA密钥对生成中，假设p=473398607161，q=4511491，e=17
求解出d作为flga提交

#WP：
from Crypto.Util.number import *

p = 473398607161
q = 4511491
e = 17

n = p*q
phin = (p-1)*(q-1)
d = inverse(e, phin)
print(d)
#flag{125631357777427553}
```



#### RSA1(dp dq 泄露)

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/1ee85bebed2345d6a120515270467506.jpeg#pic_center)

这里的两个k值不同，不可以直接移项求k

![a36a07641271ce37a3bd44573e1f1061](D:\qq\qqfile\Tencent Files\1261903425\nt_qq\nt_data\Pic\2023-10\Ori\a36a07641271ce37a3bd44573e1f1061.png)

此处费马小定理指费马小定理推论：

![image-20231011215611391](C:\Users\gyz1\AppData\Roaming\Typora\typora-user-images\image-20231011215611391.png)



```python
p = 8637633767257008567099653486541091171320491509433615447539162437911244175885667806398411790524083553445158113502227745206205327690939504032994699902053229 
q = 12640674973996472769176047937170883420927050821480010581593137135372473880595613737337630629752577346147039284030082593490776630572584959954205336880228469 
dp = 6500795702216834621109042351193261530650043841056252930930949663358625016881832840728066026150264693076109354874099841380454881716097778307268116910582929 
dq = 783472263673553449019532580386470672380574033551303889137911760438881683674556098098256795673512201963002175438762767516968043599582527539160811120550041 
c = 

#WP：
p = 8637633767257008567099653486541091171320491509433615447539162437911244175885667806398411790524083553445158113502227745206205327690939504032994699902053229 
q = 12640674973996472769176047937170883420927050821480010581593137135372473880595613737337630629752577346147039284030082593490776630572584959954205336880228469 
dp = 6500795702216834621109042351193261530650043841056252930930949663358625016881832840728066026150264693076109354874099841380454881716097778307268116910582929 
dq = 783472263673553449019532580386470672380574033551303889137911760438881683674556098098256795673512201963002175438762767516968043599582527539160811120550041 
c = 
import gmpy2
import binascii
import libnum
from Crypto.Util.number import *
I = gmpy2.invert(p,q)
mp = gmpy2.powmod(c,dp,p)
mq = gmpy2.powmod(c,dq,q)
m = ((I*(mp-mq))%q)*p+mp
print(hex(m))
print(binascii.unhexlify(hex(m)[2:]))
# 先转十六进制，去除前两个字符0x，之后以十六进制解ascii码
```



#### RSA3 (共模攻击)

```


e1=11187289

e2=9647291
```

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
import gmpy2



e1=11187289

e2=9647291 
 
def RSA_ComModAtk(e1, e2, c1, c2, n):
    e1, e2, c1, c2, n = int(e1), int(e2), int(c1), int(c2), int(n)
    if gmpy2.gcd(e1,e2) ==1:
        s = gmpy2.gcdext(e1, e2)  # 扩展欧几里得算法-辗转相除法使得  x*e1+y*e2=1,求出t和z
        x = s[1]
        y = s[2]
        if x < 0:
            x = - x  # 变指数为正值
            c1 = gmpy2.invert(c1, n)  # 求c1的逆元
        if y < 0:
            y = -y  # 变指数为正值
            c2 = gmpy2.invert(c2, n)  # 求c2的逆元
        m = (pow(c1, x, n) * pow(c2, y, n)) % n  # (c1^x*c2^y)%n=m^e1x*me2y%n=m^(e1x+e2y)%n=m%n=m
        return m
    else :
        return bytes_to_long(b'e1 and e2 are not relatively prime') # e1和e2不互质
result = RSA_ComModAtk(e1, e2, c1, c2, n)
print(long_to_bytes(result))
#b'flag{49d91077a1abcb14f1a9d546c80be9ef}'
```



#### RSA2（dp泄露）

```python
e = 65537
n = 
dp = 905074498052346904643025132879518330691925174573054004621877253318682675055421970943552016695528560364834446303196939207056642927148093290374440210503657

c = 
```

```python
import gmpy2 as gp

e = 65537
n = 
dp = 905074498052346904643025132879518330691925174573054004621877253318682675055421970943552016695528560364834446303196939207056642927148093290374440210503657

c = 

for i in range(1, e):  # 在范围(1,e)之间进行遍历
    if (dp * e - 1) % i == 0:
        if n % (((dp * e - 1) // i) + 1) == 0:  # 存在p，使得n能被p整除
            p = ((dp * e - 1) // i) + 1
            q = n // (((dp * e - 1) // i) + 1)
            phi = (q - 1) * (p - 1)  # 欧拉定理
            d = gp.invert(e, phi)  # 求模逆
            m = pow(c, d, n)  # 快速求幂取模运算

print(m)  # 10进制明文
print('------------')
print(hex(m)[2:])  # 16进制明文
print('------------')
print(bytes.fromhex(hex(m)[2:]))  # 16进制转文本
```
